thought: The Slack message action (action_3) is missing required parameters, which causes the workflow execution failure. The Slack post message action requires parameters: select, channelId, messageType, and text (with expression). I will provide these parameters properly to send the message to channel 'news' with the text from input_data.
plan: Set channelId mode to 'name' and value to 'news' to send message to #news channel
Set text parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to use text field from input_data
criticism: Without these required parameters, Slack API rejects the message. Setting them correctly will fix the issue.

tool_input.comments: Send the extracted schema text to Slack channel #news with required parameters set
